messages.content:
==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-12T09:15:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Site Supervisor
  Project Phase: Defect Liability Period
  4D Task Status: TASK_999: General Inspection - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Site Supervisor: Found some hairline cracks on this surface.
  Site Supervisor: See attached photo.

[USER QUERY]
  Check this crack.
==================================================
I am sorry, but I cannot find the photo you are referring to. Please ensure the photo is uploaded correctly and try again.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-10T14:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Facade Specialist
  Project Phase: Module Installation
  4D Task Status: TASK_505: Module Installation 6 - Sixth Floor - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Facade Specialist: I am on the gondola outside. The sealant looks loose here.

[USER QUERY]
  Is the sealant leaking here?
==================================================

I'm sorry, I cannot determine if the sealant is leaking with the available tools. I can identify that there is a building element (IfcBuildingElementProxy) with the GUID 0ifV7awIzBlRVUTYG1zp3a on the sixth floor that has a low confidence match for 'loose sealant'. Would you like me to try and find more details about this element?

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-10T11:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Main Con Supervisor
  Project Phase: Handover
  4D Task Status: TASK_045: Ground Level Cladding - COMPLETED

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Main Con Supervisor: The park-facing unit has a gap.

[USER QUERY]
  Check the window joint defect.
==================================================
I couldn't find any elements matching "window joint defect" on the "Ground Level". Would you like me to search in other areas?
